title: Naked intent
creator_credit: Victorian College of the Arts, School of Film and Television and Chris Begley
brief_description: A loose door number on a hotel room leads to surprises all round when novelty stripper Ralph Little finds himself performing for a gang of jewel thieves, all the while being watched by police surveillance - courtesy of a stuffed koala with a hidden camera.
